RESPONSE TEXT: I still can't believe what Justin was doing. Now he's been banished and I'm in charge.
First, Doctor Zimmer, then Doctor Ayo. How many people is SRB going to lose?
Acting director... I really wasn't ready for this. Guess I'll just have to make the best of it.
Nice work solving that problem with the synth escapes. Liam had us fooled pretty good.
I guess we all underestimated Liam Binet. I admit it, he got the better of us.
So it wasn't Doctor Binet helping the synths after all. Doctor Ayo had me convinced.
